Es ist eins meiner Lieblings spiele. Auch wenn man mal eine zeit genug von dem spielt hat komm ich immer wieder zurück. Das spiel verbessert sich immer mehr und ich finde es gut das immer wieder neue Killer/Überlebende/Maps kommen. finde auch gut das sie Evebts eingebaut haben, das lockert das Spiel wieder auf. Mit Freunden zu spielen macht natürlich mehr Spaß doch der Online Modus kann auch lustig sein :)

Симулятор лобби с посредственной графикой 10-х годов.
Если вы такой же любитель как и я поиграть за маньяка не более того, то вам здесь абсолютно делать нечего.
Ибо готовьтесь на самое худшее что может предоставить эта игра, это по долгу сидеть в лобби и ждать целыми-же часами когда-же соберётся народ не смотря на приличный онлайн в игре.
А то чувство что не кто не играет в неё.
Любителям поиграть за маньяка, я не коем образом не рекомендую брать эту игру хоть со скидкой хоть без.
От себя добавлю что это симулятор посредственного  лобби за ваши кровные деньги.
Эта игра настолько посредственна, что она не стоит свеч и траты времени на неё.

Shit. 
Playing as killer is fun but takes about 10-15 mins to find a game. Survivor can be fun but very rarely this is becuase the killer can easily get you.
Micheal Myers is one of the killers who were alright to go against until they decided he need to see everyone on the map making it extremly hard to play as a survivor.
Also client side is a big problem with this game because on multiple occasions the killer as swung and hit nothing yet it registers it as a hit rather than a miss.
Finally camping is a big issue with the game and just makes this game boring to play and makes you realise that there isnt much point in trying to save your friends if the camper literally stands next to them.
Progression system is pretty shit as you will have to spend ages to get the perks and addons you want and the match play of rank overall makes it hard to experiment with killers.

If you are looking for a simple, fun horror game in which you get to scare your friends or be scared by your friends I would try to find something else. There are a plethera of perks/stats/equipment for the hunter as well as the hunted which I found ironically detracted from the overall experience of the game. That being said if any of what I've said appeals to you, this could perhaps be the game for you. I hope are more fortunate in that reguard. Best of luck and happy hunting.

So I recently started to play Dead by Daylight again and I´m SO happy I did because I forgot how fun the game actually is in most cases.
This has to be one of the funniest 1v4 games I have ever played. It´s a blast to play with friends or Solo if you don´t have anything else to do. I do have some cons though that I will write out down below.

Pros:
-Easy to start, Hard to master (which I really like)
-Very well optimized in most cases
-Really fun to play with friends or solo
-A WIDE variety of fun perks both for killer and survivor/victim which all does pretty different stuff
-Fun events during Halloween, Christmas, Summer etc

Cons:
-The game´s hitbox on survivor/victim is VERY weird, the killer can literally hit you through walls and/or Pallets sometimes
-Lack of "advanced graphics settings" (specified in "Conclusion")


Conclusion:
Dead by Daylight is a very fun game to play with friends when you don´t have too much to do since it´s very easy to just jump in and play a couple of matches.

Also I like to have the opportunity to change specific graphic settings which you can´t do what so ever at the moment apart from fullscreen/windowed and V-Sync. But other than that I really enjoy my time in Dead by Daylight and I can still really recommend it if you´re into 1v4 games :D



8/10

When I first got Dead By Daylight, I was told the community was extremely toxic, the game was horribly broken and unbalanced and that it was over all not worth it. I picked it up anyway.

I'm glad I did.

[h1]Toxicity[/h1]

In terms of toxicity, yes, it can be toxic at times, though I don't normally see toxic players very often. Really, it IS a online game, so you will certainly see toxic players. That's just life. When I DO see toxic players, they're toxic in such bizarre ways it is almost entertaining. Most toxic players I've seen are toxic towards their teammates, oddly enough. Sure, some will hate on the killer, but most toxic players will do one of two things: If they survive, they'll insult those who died, no matter how they died. If they die, they'll get enraged and insult the team for leaving them to die, again regardless of if it was even possible to save them or not. If it's a toxic killer, then most people won't really care either way. If they killer is camping someone, then everyone else can basically win, or the person who is getting camped will normally just leave. No point in staying if the killer is like that, spend your time with better players. Toxic survivors also often leave the game instantly after they get caught, messing up the rest of the team.

Slightly rarer than toxic players are the nice players. They'll actually have a civil conversation after the match, talking about risky escapes, nice plays, that sort of stuff with the killer. Players who are civil like this make the game go from good to great. If you're this type of player, I love you. Sometimes killers are nice too. For example, if a toxic player leaves, it sets everyone else back. If the killers nice, which happens sometimes, they'll let the survivors get caught up to a reasonable point before continuing the match.

Most people, however, fall into a neutral category. They aren't toxic, but they aren't nice either. Most of them won't actually care to discuss the match after all is said and done and they'll display some mixture of toxic and nice behaviours.

TL;DR - As far as I've played, it's not as toxic as most multiplayer games out there.

[h1]Balance & Bugs[/h1]

I have yet to notice anything too broken. Bugs exist, but I rarely encounter them. The only one that I notice somewhat frequently is the interaction button and combat buttons getting stuck. Makes it hard to kill or escape sometimes. There is also lag every so often, which most people seem to encounter at some point during game sessions.

In terms of balance, it is a bit unbalanced. I don't view this as a negative, however. It should be difficult to be a survivor. It should technically be easier to be the killer. It seems to me that it is.

A really good killer is a brutal opponent. If they're toxic, it's terrible, but a nice, yet effective killer is a joy to play against. Killers seem to be, in my experience as both a killer and survivor, somewhat easy to learn, but hard to master.

That being said, some killers are VERY difficult to face. Whether due to skill or just the killer themselves, they're nightmares to face. Even in over fifty hours, there are some killers I still haven't won a match against, such as the Doctor and the Nightmare.

As a killer, it can be very difficult to start off. The killers perks are new, strategies are different and each has a different power. Expect to lose a lot when starting as a killer. Though, with time and practise, killers become MUCH easier.

In total, I think that killers have won maybe 80-90% of the matches I've played, not including when I was brand new. Killers have a large advantage, but it's not a unreasonable one.

[h1]Conclusion[/h1]

In the end, I'm very pleased with this game. There are lots of different killers, such as classic killers, like the Shape, as well as more original killers like the Nurse. There's a killer to suit many different play styles, as well as survivors for however you want to try to survive. It's unbalanced, but both sides generally get a fair chance. The game isn't terribly toxic, nor broken and when it's good, it's [i]good[/i].

Quick paced game(s), fun with strangers, even more fun with friends in discord.

Jogo íncrivel, ainda mais divertido com amigos.
O jogo tem bugs? Sim. Balanceamento ideal? Não. Comunidade Tóxica? Sim. Mas quem liga se te trará momentos hilários e tensos? A ideia do jogo é genial, colocar 4 sobreviventes com vantagens diferentes de cada um e estratégias diferentes em uma floresta junto com um assassino que também utiliza de táticas diferentes, sendo que cada assassino tem uma habilidade que se diferencia dos outros. Se você realmente quer melhorar no jogo, deve jogar MUITO para conquistar as melhorias dos sobreviventes e assassinos.
O jogo é bem tenso dependendo do que você for enfrentar, além de ter que saber o que fazer para enfrentar cada coisa, isso se aplica aos sobreviventes e assassinos. Sinceramente, o gráfico não importa, jogabilidade boa, mas tem seus erros de vez em quando, não seja um sobrevivente chorão que reclama de um assassino camper, é só uma das estratégias do jogo, afinal, ganhar com um sobrevivente não significa fugir do local, mas sim fazer uma boa partida, reparando geradores, ajudando outros jogadores, distrair o assassino para ganhar tempo, isso tudo conta.
Como assassino, não fique triste se alguns escaparem ou TODOS, é só um aviso para você melhorar seu estilo de jogo ou mecânica. Não há bugs frequentes, em alguns dias não encontrei nada ainda.
O jogo em si tem uma temática boa, não precisa gastar mais do que o jogo para ser melhor, mas uma crítica é de que os assassinos e sobreviventes de DLCs são pagos com uma quantia razoável se comparar com o preço do jogo, há como obter dentro do game, mas é MUITO demorado o processo, os Pontos Iridescentes são usados para comprar eles, para conseguir os pontos é necessário o UP de level, você ganha uns 164 por level, você precisa em média jogar 4 partidas até o final para upar, os personagens são 9000 cada.
Resumindo:
Junte seus amigos porque não precisa de um PC DA NASA para rodar o game, o preço do jogo é barato e agradável, lhe garante muito tempo de jogo e de diversão! Bom jogo!

Das Spiel ist ungewöhnlich und erstaunt durch den starken Gebrauch von menschlichen Emotionen. Der einzige Haken ist jedoch die Menge an Salz, die sich im Verlauf eines Matches anhäufen kann... Ich unterstütze dieses Spiel jedoch sehr. Es ist nicht perfekt, ist aber über den Laufe der Jahre deutlich besser geworden.

Also ich muss sagen ich liebe dieses Spiel wirklich sehr. Es macht mega viel Spaß und ich liebe den Nervenkitzel, wenn man hofft vom Killer nicht endeckt zu werden.
Allerdings würde ich mir wünschen das es einen Alternativgrund gibt als immer nur "Verbindung wurde vom Host getrennt" ... Es kann nicht sein das bei 8 von 10 Versuchen die Hosts immer die Verbindung kappen. (klingt etwas unlogisch) Auch habe ich nachgeguckt und meine Internetverbindung läuft super, daran kann es nicht liegen...

Ansonsten ist das Spiel wirklich lohnenswert. ^^
